artist: Artist: Kawase Hasui; Publisher: Kawaguchi Jirō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: thick patch of irises, with maroon, purple, white and purple, and white and maroon flowers
inscription: bottom margin: 昭和四年七月作 {Shōwa yonen shichigatsu saku}
markings: LRC, red round artist\'s seal: 川セ {Kawase}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text:
On back: red seal 参百五拾枚限絶版、第百五拾五號 {sanbyakugojū mai kagiri zeppan, dai hyakugojūgo gō} (edition of 350, no. 155); no Kawaguchi (publisher) seal on print.
Second edition, published by Kawaguchi alone in the 1930s.
title: Irises
